LanguageData.CrimsonKnightArmour.label: crimson knight armour
LanguageData.CrimsonKnightArmour.description: Overlapping solid plates of armor covering the entire body from neck to feet.
LanguageData.CrimsonKnightHelmet.label: crimson knight helmet
LanguageData.CrimsonKnightHelmet.description: A tough reinforced helmet, not very effective against blunt weapons.
